session_summary: Nate and Joanna talked at 8:10 pm on 7 November, 2022. Nate won a Valorant tournament last Saturday, while Joanna finished a presentation for producers on Friday. Nate is preparing for more tournaments and enjoys being busy. Joanna is working on a new movie script and has submitted scripts recently. They both value creating and cherishing memories. Nate has turtles and upgraded his gaming setup. Joanna enjoys writing and recalls childhood memories fondly. They encourage each other to pursue their dreams and make more memories together.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Hey Joanna! Hope youâ€™re doing alright. Crazy thing happened - I was in the final of a big Valorant tournament last Saturday, and I won! It was the best feeling to see my name as the champion. Tournaments really bring out strong emotions in me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a notebook with a handwritten letter on it
conversation_turns.query: notebook handwritten script movie script presentation movie producers
conversation_turns.text: Hey Nate! Congrats on winning the tournament - that's awesome! I know you must have been buzzing! Anyway, I've been working on something exciting too. Last Friday, I finished the presentation for producers - it was tough but it's looking good. What have you been up to?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Joanna! I've been having a blast and preparing for other tournaments, so I've been real busy - but I'm loving it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a book with a black border and a white title
conversation_turns.text: Sounds like you're really loving life right now! It's great when you find something that suits you. Being busy can be tiring but it's so rewarding in the end. Keep it up!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Joanna! I'm really grateful to have a job I enjoy every day. So anyways, anything new going on in your life?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: I am writing another movie script! It's a love story with lots of challenges. I've put lots of hard work into it and I'm hoping to get it on the big screen.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a turtle laying on a bed of rocks and gravel
conversation_turns.text: Woah Joanna, that's incredible! I remember when you started working on these sorta things. It's crazy to see how far you've gotten! You've really got a thing for writing, huh? Where'd you get the idea for it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Thanks Nate! Writing has always been a passion of mine. I got the idea for this script from a dream. How have your turtles been? I haven't seen pictures of them in a while!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Great actually! These little guys sure bring joy to my life! Watching them is so calming and fascinating. I've really grown fond of them. So, what about you, Joanna? What brings you happiness?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Creating stories and watching them come alive gives me happiness and fulfillment. Writing has been such a blessing for me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Well with dedication like yours, its no wonder you do so well in it as well! Are you planning on submitting anymore scripts anytime soon?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Yep! I actually just submitted a few more last week! Hoping to hear back from them soon, though I assume a few will be rejected.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Even if it happens to a few, I'm sure at leasts one will make it to the screens and be your 3rd published movie!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Nate! Appreciate the encouragement. I won't give up, I promise! Got it covered!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a desk with a computer monitor and a keyboard
conversation_turns.text: Great to hear! On another note, I just upgraded some of my equipment at home. Check it out!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Oh wow, ice set-up! Do you use that computer for gaming?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Yep! This is where I practice and compete. Sometimes I even use it when I'm playing games with friends.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Cool! Having a dedicated space for practice and competition should help you stay focused.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a desk with two monitors and a laptop
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, I love it. It's like my own little haven to escape into the virtual world.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that sounds great to have your own gaming setup at home. It must be really awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a pair of headphones and a video game controller
conversation_turns.text: It really is! But it's also really important to have something like this for my career, otherwise I would never be able to beat my competition.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: That makes sense! It's all about practice isn't it? So what's your favorite game?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two nintendo game covers with a picture of a group of people
conversation_turns.text: Yep! I'm currently playing this awesome fantasy RPG called "Xeonoblade Chronicles" and it's been a blast! I highly reccomend it if you've never played it before.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: What made you start playing it? That's a japanese game series right?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a woman in a costume holding a glass
conversation_turns.text: Yes it is! I'm a big fan of Nintendo games, and I've actually been wanting to play this one for a while because my friends have played it and reccomended it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a captain america costume on display in a museum
conversation_turns.text: Nice! It's really cool when a reccomendation from a friend fits your taste so well isn't it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: For sure! That's why I love when you give me movie reccomendations, I usually like them a lot more then if I were to just watch some random one.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a handwritten letter from a young man
conversation_turns.text: Great to hear! I just finished with the intro to my next movie script, and I decided to include this at the begining.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: That letter is really awesome! Does it remind you of your childhood?

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, it does! My brother wrote it - he used to make me these cute notes when we were kids. Brings back sweet memories.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Aww, childhood memories can be so powerful!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two little girls in pink dresses standing in front of a castle
conversation_turns.text: They sure can! They take us back to simpler times but it's nice to create new memories as we grow up.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Totally! I had a special day when I took my pets to the park. They were amazed and seeing their happy faces made it a memorable day. Mixing the new with the old is priceless - I treasure every memory!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person holding a notebook with a list of things on it
conversation_turns.text: That sounds so sweet, Nate! I started writing some of my favorite memories down.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Dang, your full of great ideas Joanna! I really should start doing that as well, or at least write down the things my animals like a lot!

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.text: You should! I completely encourage it, looking back on fond memories is such a blessing.

conversation_turns.speaker: Nate
conversation_turns.text: Ok I will! But I'll also start writing down some of my favorite memories with you from now on.

conversation_turns.speaker: Joanna
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two women sitting on a bed laughing and laughing
conversation_turns.text: Definitely, let's keep making great memories and supporting each other. Let's keep reaching for our dreams and make them happen!

Joanna: Joanna prepares a presentation for her movie script on a woman on a journey of self-discovery for the meetings with movie producers.
Joanna starts writing another movie script based on a love story and puts her brother's childhood letter to her in the Introduction part.
Nate: Nate wins a Valorant video game tournament
Nate upgrades his gaming equipment at home
Nate won a big Valorant tournament making him the champion.
Nate prepares for other tournaments and enjoys his job.
Nate owns turtles that bring joy and calmness to his life.
Nate upgraded some equipment at home for gaming purposes.
Nate practices and competes on his computer for gaming.
Nate is currently playing a fantasy RPG called "Xenoblade Chronicles" and recommends it.
Joanna: Joanna finished a presentation for producers last Friday.
Joanna is writing a movie script, a love story with lots of challenges.
Joanna submitted a few scripts last week and expects some rejections.
Joanna finds happiness and fulfillment in writing.
Joanna incorporates memories and childhood experiences into her writing.
